maml:description.maml:para: Creates a suppression for recommendation(s), this enables a particular recommendation to be postponed for a specific duration or infinitely.

maml:Description.maml:para: The powershell object type PsAzureAdvisorResourceRecommendationBase returned by Get-AzAdvisorRecommendation call.
Days to disable.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with Azure.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
ResourceName of the recommendation
Days to disable.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with Azure.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Id of the recommendation to be suppressed.
Days to disable.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with Azure.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
Days to disable.
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with Azure.
The powershell object type PsAzureAdvisorResourceRecommendationBase returned by Get-AzAdvisorRecommendation call.
ResourceName of the recommendation
Id of the recommendation to be suppressed.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
PS C:\> Disable-AzAdvisorRecommendation -Name "f380a3a8-9d18-cfad-78e0-55762c72a178"
SuppressionId : d1f70547-0e72-db29-443e-c1164d5d4377 Ttl : -1 Id : /subscriptions/{user_subscription}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Cache/Redis/xyz/providers/Microsoft.Advisor/recommendations /{recommendation_id}/suppressions/HardCodedSupressionName Name : HardCodedSupressionName Type : Microsoft.Advisor/suppressions

dev:remarks.maml:para: Create a suppression for the given recommendation name with a default-SuppressionName and default days as -1.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 2 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
PS C:\> Disable-AzAdvisorRecommendation -ResourceId "/subscriptions/{user_subscription}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Cache/Redis/xyz" -Days 12
SuppressionId : 7d1f0547-0e72-db29-443e-c1164d5d4377 Ttl : 12.00:00:00 Id : /subscriptions/{user_subscription}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Cache/Redis/xyz/providers/Microsoft.Advisor/recommendations /{recommendation_id}/suppressions/HardCodedSupressionName Name : HardCodedSupressionName Type : Microsoft.Advisor/suppressions

dev:remarks.maml:para: A suppression is created for the given recommendation-Id.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 3 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
PS C:\> Get-AzAdvisorRecommendation -ResourceId "/subscriptions/user_subscription/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Cache/Redis/xyz" | Disable-A zAdvisorRecommendation
SuppressionId : daf24e78-af2d-e8d3-9c50-fa970edc2937 Ttl : -1 Id : /subscriptions/{user_subscription}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Cache/Redis/xyz/providers/Microsoft.Advisor/recommendations /{recommendation_id}/suppressions/HardCodedSupressionName Name : HardCodedSupressionName Type : Microsoft.Advisor/suppressions

dev:remarks.maml:para: Creating a suppression, piping from Get-AzAdvisorRecommendation to Disable-AzAdvisorRecommendation.

maml:description.maml:para: This cmdlet enables a previously suppressed recommendation. You can remove all the suppressions associated with a recommendation as well.

maml:Description.maml:para: The powershell object type PsAzureAdvisorResourceRecommendationBase returned by Get-AzAdvisorRecommendation call.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with Azure.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.

Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with Azure.

Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with Azure.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.

ResourceName of the recommendation.
Id of the recommendation to be suppressed.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
PS C:\> Enable-AzAdvisorRecommendation -ResourceId c3621337-f131-4bf4-92f2-3fb9c8cfa0d8
ResourceId : subscriptions/{user_subscription}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Cache/Redis/xyz/providers/Microsoft.Advisor/recommendations/c3621337-f131-4bf4-92f2-3fb9c8cfa0d8 Category : Performance ExtendedProperties : {} Impact : Medium ImpactedField : Microsoft.Cache/Redis ImpactedValue : xyz LastUpdated : 12/4/2018 12:06:47 AM Metadata : {} RecommendationTypeId : 905a0026-8010-45b2-ab46-a92c3e4a5131 Risk : None ShortDescription : problem : Improve the performance and reliability of your Redis Cache instance solution : Follow Redis cache Advisor recommendations
SuppressionIds : {} Name : c3621337-f131-4bf4-92f2-3fb9c8cfa0d8 Type : Microsoft.Advisor/recommendations

dev:remarks.maml:para: Removes all the suppressions for the given recommendation with name "recommendation_id".

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 2 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
PS C:\> Get-AzAdvisorRecommendation -ResourceId "/subscriptions/{user_subscription}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Cache/Redis/xyz" | Enable-AzAdvisorRecommendation
ResourceId : subscriptions/{user_subscription}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Cache/Redis/xyz/providers/Microsoft.Advisor/recommendations/{recommendation_id} Category : Performance ExtendedProperties : {} Impact : Medium ImpactedField : Microsoft.Cache/Redis ImpactedValue : xyz LastUpdated : 12/4/2018 12:06:47 AM Metadata : {} RecommendationTypeId : 905a0026-8010-45b2-ab46-a92c3e4a5131 Risk : None ShortDescription : problem : Improve the performance and reliability of your Redis Cache instance solution : Follow Redis cache Advisor recommendations
SuppressionIds : {} Name : {recommendation_id} Type : Microsoft.Advisor/recommendations

dev:remarks.maml:para: Removes all the suppressions for the given recommendation(s) passed from the pipeline.

maml:description.maml:para: Get the Azure Advisor configurations for the given subscription or resource group.
The configurations associated with a subscription have two types:
Subscription level configuration: There can be only one configuration of this type for a subscription. LowCpuThreshold and Exclude are the only property of this type of configuration.
ResourceGroup level configuration: There can be only one configuration for each ResourceGroup in a subscription. Exclude is the only property of this type of configuration.

maml:Description.maml:para: The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with Azure.
Resource Group name of the configuration
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with Azure.
Resource Group name of the configuration

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
PS C:\>$data = Get-AzAdvisorConfiguration Id : /subscriptions/{user_subscription}/providers/Microsoft.Advisor/configurations/{user_subscription} Name : {user_subscription} Properties : Microsoft.Azure.Commands.Advisor.Cmdlets.Models.PsAzureAdvisorConfigurationProperties Type : Microsoft.Advisor/Configurations
Id : /subscriptions/{user_subscription}/providers/Microsoft.Advisor/configurations/{user_subscription}-{resourceGroupName} Name : {user_subscription}-{resourceGroupName} Properties : Microsoft.Azure.Commands.Advisor.Cmdlets.Models.PsAzureAdvisorConfigurationProperties Type : Microsoft.Advisor/Configurations
PS C:\>$data[0].Properties AdditionalProperties : Exclude : False LowCpuThreshold : 20
PS C:\>$data[1].Properties AdditionalProperties : Exclude : True LowCpuThreshold : null

dev:remarks.maml:para: Retrieves a list of Azure Advisor Configuration(s).

maml:description.maml:para: Gets a list of Azure Advisor recommendations.
Obtains the list of Azure Advisor recommendations. Can be filtered by Category, resource-ID, name etc.

maml:Description.maml:para: Category of the recommendation
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with Azure.
ResourceGroup name of the recommendation
ResourceId of the recommendation
Category of the recommendation
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with Azure.
Category of the recommendation
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with Azure.
ResourceGroup name of the recommendation
ResourceId of the recommendation

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 1 --------------------------

dev:remarks.maml:para: Gets the list of all recommendations.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 2 --------------------------

dev:remarks.maml:para: Gets the list of all recommendations filtered by category Performance.

maml:description.maml:para: Updates or creates the Azure Advisor Configuration.
Used to update the configuration of the Azure Advisor. Two types of Configuration are present: Subscription level configuration and ResourceGroup level configuration.

Subscription level configuration: There can be only one Configuration for this type for a subscription. LowCpuThreshold and Exclude properties can be updated using this cmdlet. ResourceGroup level configuration: There can be only one configuration for each ResourceGroup. Only Exclude property can be updated using this cmdlet.

maml:Description.maml:para: Value for Low Cpu threshold.
The powershell object type PsAzureAdvisorConfigurationData returned by Get-AzAdvisorConfiguration call.
Exclude from the recommendation generation. If not specified exclude property will be set to false.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with Azure.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Resource Group name for the configuration.
The powershell object type PsAzureAdvisorConfigurationData returned by Get-AzAdvisorConfiguration call.
Exclude from the recommendation generation. If not specified exclude property will be set to false.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with Azure.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with Azure.
Exclude from the recommendation generation. If not specified exclude property will be set to false.
The powershell object type PsAzureAdvisorConfigurationData returned by Get-AzAdvisorConfiguration call.
Value for Low Cpu threshold.
Resource Group name for the configuration.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
PS C:\> Set-AzAdvisorConfiguration -LowCpuThreshold 10 Id : /subscriptions/{user_subscription}/resourceGroups/resourceGroupName1/providers/Microsoft.Advisor/configurations/{user_subscription} Name : {user_subscription} Properties : additionalProperties : null exclude : False lowCpuThreshold : 10
Type : Microsoft.Advisor/Configurations

dev:remarks.maml:para: Updates the configuration(lowCpuThreshold) for subscription level Configuration.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 2 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
PS C:\> Set-AzAdvisorConfiguration -LowCpuThreshold 15 -Exclude Id : /subscriptions/{user_subscription}/resourceGroups/resourceGroupName1/providers/Microsoft.Advisor/configurations/{user_subscription} Name : {user_subscription} Properties : additionalProperties : null exclude : True lowCpuThreshold : 15
Type : Microsoft.Advisor/Configurations

dev:remarks.maml:para: Updates the configuration(lowCpuThreshold, exclude) for subscription level Configuration and excludes from the recommendation generation.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 3 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
PS C:\> Set-AzAdvisorConfiguration -ResourceGroupName resourceGroupName1 -Exclude
Id : /subscriptions/{user_subscription}/resourceGroups/resourceGroupName1/providers/Microsoft.Advisor/configurations/{user_subscription}-resourceGroupName1 Name : {user_subscription}-resourceGroupName1 Properties : additionalProperties : null exclude : True lowCpuThreshold : null
Type : Microsoft.Advisor/Configurations

dev:remarks.maml:para: Updates the configuration(exclude) for resourceGroupName1 to be excluded in the recommendation generation.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 4 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
PS C:\> Get-AzAdvisorConfiguration | Set-AzAdvisorConfiguration -LowCpuThreshold 20 Id : /subscriptions/{user_subscription}/resourceGroups/resourceGroupName1/providers/Microsoft.Advisor/configurations/{user_subscription} Name : {user_subscription} Properties : additionalProperties : null exclude : False lowCpuThreshold : 20
Type : Microsoft.Advisor/Configurations

dev:remarks.maml:para: Updates the configuration for the given recommendation passed on from the pipeline.
